title: Average regular season home attendance of the Cleveland Browns 2008 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2017 to 2013.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2011 to 2008.
But, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2017.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2013 to 2011.
gold: This graph depicts the average regular season home attendance of the Cleveland Browns from 2008 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average attendance at home games of the Cleveland Browns was 67,431 .
